about.title: About me
about.name: Konstantin Shenderov
about.positionName: Test Automation Engineer and Full Stack Developer
about.description: Hello, I am Konstantin Shenderov, an ISTQB Certified Test Automation Engineer and Full Stack Developer from the Middle Eastern Country of Israel. The seven years of experience in software, hardware, and firmware testing, combined with a strong background in full stack web development, has enabled me to develop and create unique test automation solutions using a wide range of tools. My expertise ranges from software testing and QA automation to full stack, back-end, and front-end development.

elements.description: As part of the Artifactory team, I have been responsible for the quality and performance of the product, as well as, creating and generating suggestions for enhanced customer experience. My duties include developing and implementing automated test practices using a wide range of tools (Groovy, Geb, and Spock) that focus on improving efficiency.

In my role as a QC Engineer, I performed integration testing, troubleshooting, and quality control of real-time 3D graphics and video systems for world-leading broadcasters while in close cooperation with the research and development department. In my role as a QA engineer at Orad, I tested new versions of software, firmware, and hardware as well as maintained the records and database of systems tested in a central company repository.

As part of the Viaccess-Orca team, my responsibilities included developing and implementing automated test practices for both web applications and back-end API using, primarily, Selenium Web Driver and SoapUI. In addition to this, my job was to design and create automated configuration scripts and tools using the programming languages of Java and Groovy. Beyond this, I developed and implemented data loading and generation solutions using load and performance testing technologies. I also worked hand-in-hand with QA managers and colleagues to define processes and strategies associated with automation and participated in product design reviews in order to provide input on functional requirements, product designs, schedules, and potential problems. Finally, my role also included researching and testing new test tools, practices, and technologies in order to improve testing processes and decrease test time.

blocks.label: Software Testing
blocks.value: With over seven years of experience as a software, hardware, and firmware test engineer, I have the capability, methodology, and documentation to plan, develop, and execute on a wide range of test practices using today's most popular tools and approaches.

blocks.label: QA Automation
blocks.value: Whether you need test automation solutions for Web UI and REST API done through Selenium Web Driver, TestNG, JUnit, Geb, Spock Framework, BrowserStack, and SoapUI, or automated configuration scripting done through Java, Groovy, or Bash, my developed test automation solutions can get the job done. Beyond developing and maintaining complex testing environments and frameworks for automated tests using open-source continuous integration software tools such as Jenkins, Docker, and VMs, I can also generate and load data for performance and load testing purposes.

blocks.label: DevOps
blocks.value: Regardless of what operating system is in use (Linux, MacOS, or Windows), I can configure, test and production environments such as web and application servers, load balancers, databases, NAS, proxy networks, and CI/CD tools. Beyond this, my experience extends to virtualisation and the cloud, via Amazon Web Services, Google Cloud Platform, VMware, and Virtual Box, as well as, containerization with Docker.

blocks.label: Full-Stack Development
blocks.value: In using modern frameworks and technologies like Java, Spring Boot, Hibernate, HTML5, CSS3, and AngularJS, I am able to take a web application from its inception as an idea, all the way to production.

blocks.label: Back-End Development
blocks.value: With a strong knowledge background in Core Java, Spring Framework, Spring Boot, Hibernate, and JDBC, I am able to develop back-end applications, create REST APIs, as well as store, fetch, and process data using SQL and NoSQL databases. All done with clean code and good unit test coverage.

blocks.label: Front-End Development
blocks.value: In using a wide range of modern frameworks and technologies for front-end application development such as HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, AngularJS, and jQuery, I can create applications that have responsive design on all browsers and platforms.
